message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $8,750 is a more reasonable price for me. Would you be willing to consider that?
